snippet.description: 视频。默认宽度300px、高度225px，可通过wxss设置宽高
snippet.body: <video class="${1}" src="${2}" initial-time="${3:0}" autoplay="${4:false}" loop="${5:false}" muted="${6:false}" direction="${7:0}" bindplay="${8}" bindpause="${9}" bindended="${10}" bindtimeupdate="${11}" bindwaiting="${12}" binderror="${13}"> ${14} </video>
